div.p: Parents: here are some suggestions on resources and how to answer questions about Coronavirus.

h1.style: margin: 0px 0px 30px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px 0px 2px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(202, 200, 199); outline: 0px; font-size: 32px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: "Open Sans Condensed", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 30px; color: rgb(207, 118, 0); box-shadow: rgb(250, 250, 250) 0px 2px 0px, rgb(202, 200, 199) 0px 4px 0px; text-size-adjust: auto;

span.h1: Talking to Children About COVID-19 (Coronavirus): A Parent Resource

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

span.p: A new type of coronavirus, abbreviated COVID-19, is causing an outbreak of respiratory (lung) disease.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

span.p: Concern over this new virus can make children and families anxious. While we don’t know where and to what extent the disease may spread here in the United States, we do know that it is contagious, that the severity of illness can vary from individual to individual, and that there are steps we can take to prevent the spread of infection. Acknowledging some level of concern, without panicking, is appropriate and can result in taking actions that reduce the risk of illness. Helping children cope with anxiety requires providing accurate prevention information and facts without causing undue alarm.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

span.p: It is very important to remember that children look to adults for guidance on how to react to stressful events. If parents seem overly worried, children’s anxiety may rise. Parents should reassure children that health and school officials are working hard to ensure that people throughout the country stay healthy. However, children also need factual, age appropriate information about the potential seriousness of disease risk and concrete instruction about how to avoid infections and spread of disease. Teaching children positive preventive measures, talking with them about their fears, and giving them a sense of some control over their risk of infection can help reduce anxiety.

h2.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 23px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); line-height: 30px; font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Children will react to and follow your verbal and nonverbal reactions.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: What you say and do about COVID-19, current prevention efforts, and related events can either increase or decrease your children’s anxiety.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: If true, emphasize to your children that they and your family are fine.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Remind them that you and the adults at their school are there to keep them safe and healthy.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Let your children talk about their feelings and help reframe their concerns into the appropriate perspective.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Children may need extra attention from you and may want to talk about their concerns, fears, and questions.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: It is important that they know they have someone who will listen to them; make time for them.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Tell them you love them and give them plenty of affection.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: When tensions are high, sometimes we try to blame someone.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: It is important to avoid stereotyping any one group of people as responsible for the virus.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Bullying or negative comments made toward others should be stopped and reported to the school.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Be aware of any comments that other adults are having around your family. You may have to explain what comments mean if they are different than the values that you have at home.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

h4.strong: Monitor television viewing and social media.

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Limit television viewing or access to information on the Internet and through social media. Try to avoid watching or listening to information that might be upsetting when your children are present.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Speak to your child about how many stories about COVID-19 on the Internet may be based on rumors and inaccurate information.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Talk to your child about factual information of this disease—this can help reduce anxiety.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Constantly watching updates on the status of COVID-19 can increase anxiety—avoid this.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Be aware that developmentally inappropriate information (i.e., information designed for adults) can cause anxiety or confusion, particularly in young

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Engage your child in games or other interesting activities instead.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

h4.strong: Maintain a normal routine to the extent possible.

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Keep to a regular schedule, as this can be reassuring and promotes physical health.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Encourage your children to keep up with their schoolwork and extracurricular activities, but don’t push them if they seem overwhelmed.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: In the absence of factual information, children often imagine situations far worse than reality.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Don’t ignore their concerns, but rather explain that at the present moment very few people in this country are sick with COVID-19.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Children can be told this disease is thought to be spread between people who are in close contact with one another—when an infected person coughs or sneezes.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: It is also thought it can be spread when you touch an infected surface or object, which is why it is so important to protect yourself.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: For additional factual information contact your school nurse, ask your doctor, or check the https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html website.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: The CDC believes these symptoms appear in a few days after being exposed to someone with the disease or as long as 14 days after exposure:

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Fever

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Cough

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Shortness for breath

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: For some people the symptoms are like having a cold; for others they are quite severe or even life threatening. In either case it is important to check with your child’s healthcare provider (or yours) and follow instructions about staying home or away from public spaces to prevent the spread of the virus.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

h4.strong: Review and model basic hygiene and healthy lifestyle practices for protection.

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li:
Encourage your child to practice every day good hygiene—simple steps to prevent spread of illness:
Wash hands multiple times a day for at least 20 seconds (singing Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star slowly takes about 20 seconds).
Cover their mouths with a tissue when they sneeze or cough and throw away the tissue immediately, or sneeze or cough into the bend of their elbow. Do not share food or drinks.
Practice giving fist or elbow bumps instead of handshakes. Fewer germs are spread this way.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Giving children guidance on what they can do to prevent infection gives them a greater sense of control over disease spread and will help to reduce their anxiety.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Encourage your child to eat a balanced diet, get enough sleep, and exercise regularly; this will help them develop a strong immune system to fight off illness.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

h4.strong: Discuss new rules or practices at school.

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Many schools already enforce illness prevention habits, including frequent hand washing or use of alcohol-based hand cleansers.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Your school nurse or principal will send information home about any new rules or practices.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Be sure to discuss this with your child.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Contact your school nurse with any specific questions.

h4.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

strong.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.style: margin: 0px 0px 20px 2em; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; list-style-position: initial; list-style-image: initial; caret-color: rgb(68, 68, 68); color: rgb(68, 68, 68); font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; text-size-adjust: auto;

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Let your school know if your child is sick and keep them home. Your school may ask if your child has a fever or not. This information will help the school to know why your child was kept home. If your child is diagnosed with COVID-19, let the school know so they can communicate with and get guidance from local health authorities.

li.style: margin: 0px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

ul.li: Talk to your school nurse, school psychologist, school counselor, or school social worker if your child is having difficulties as a result of anxiety or stress related to COVID-19. They can give guidance and support to your child at school.

li.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

em.style: margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; outline: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: transparent; box-sizing: border-box;

li.em: Make sure to follow all instructions from your school.
